summary: Move NativeConnectionOptions fields (identity and workerBinaryId) from connection-level to worker-level configuration. This requires coordination with Core-side changes.
userImpact: Users need to reconfigure where these connection options are specified, moving them from connection to worker setup.
rootCause: Fields are currently at the wrong API level (connection instead of worker)
proposedFix: Move NativeConnectionOptions.identity and NativeConnectionOptions.workerBinaryId to Worker configuration
resolutionDetails: Fields were moved to worker-level configuration in coordination with Core-side changes
keyQuote: Move these to Worker: NativeConnectionOptions.identity NativeConnectionOptions.workerBinaryId
